attributes.action: adequately fund an affordable national integrated public transport network that meets peoples needs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that a fully integrated bus, coach, and rail network that is affordable for people to use will reduce the carbon emmissions created in the UK. 
Including suitable funding for road to rail freight terminals and expanding the rail network will reduce the number of good vehicles on the road and thus reduce congestion, further reduce pollution, and road accidents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
